mapper.insert: insert into file (id, project_id, report_id, name, type, resource_dir, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reportId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceDir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update file set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, report_id = #{reportId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resource_dir = #{resourceDir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, project_id, report_id, name, type, resource_dir, create_time from file
